name: TheMasterRoaster
0:
”Alexa, open the master roaster”
”Alexa, start the master roaster”
”Alexa, ask the master roaster for a burn”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the master roaster
des: Use your Smart Home Alexa to Roast you and your friends to the ground. These are sarcastic responses that are not generated online. These responses are obviously not true, but can be funny, and big! Please enjoy!
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
